metadata.description: Predefined cultural venues - core data only

venues.name: Getty Center
venues.address: 1200 Getty Center Dr, Los Angeles, CA 90049
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Art museum with gardens and city views.

venues.name: Los Angeles County Museum of Art (LACMA)
venues.tour_info: Admission $20. Largest art museum in the western United States.

venues.name: Griffith Observatory
venues.address: 2800 E Observatory Rd, Los Angeles, CA 90027
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Observatory with planetarium and city views.

venues.name: Hollywood Walk of Fame
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Famous sidewalk with celebrity stars.

venues.name: Santa Monica Pier
venues.address: 200 Santa Monica Pier, Santa Monica, CA 90401
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Historic pier with amusement park and Pacific views.

venues.name: San Francisco Museum of Modern Art (SFMOMA)
venues.tour_info: Admission $25. Modern and contemporary art museum.

venues.name: de Young Museum
venues.address: 50 Hagiwara Tea Garden Dr, San Francisco, CA 94118
venues.tour_info: Admission $15. Art museum featuring American and international art.

venues.name: Palace of Fine Arts
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Historic landmark with classical architecture.

venues.name: Golden Gate Bridge
venues.address: Golden Gate Bridge, San Francisco, CA
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Iconic suspension bridge with pedestrian walkway.

venues.name: Alcatraz Island
venues.tour_info: Ferry required. Former federal prison with guided tours.

venues.name: Art Institute of Chicago
venues.tour_info: Admission $25. World-renowned art museum with Impressionist collection.

venues.name: Field Museum
venues.address: 1400 S Lake Shore Dr, Chicago, IL 60605
venues.tour_info: Admission $26. Natural history museum with Sue the T. rex.

venues.name: Shedd Aquarium
venues.address: 1200 S Lake Shore Dr, Chicago, IL 60605
venues.tour_info: Admission $40. One of the world's largest indoor aquariums.

venues.name: Millennium Park
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Public park with Cloud Gate sculpture.

venues.name: Willis Tower Skydeck
venues.tour_info: Admission $30. Glass observation deck on 103rd floor.

venues.name: Museum of Fine Arts Boston
venues.tour_info: Admission $25. Comprehensive art museum with diverse collections.

venues.name: Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum
venues.tour_info: Admission $20. Historic mansion with art collection and gardens.

venues.name: Freedom Trail
venues.tour_info: Free admission. 2.5-mile trail through historic Boston sites.

venues.name: Fenway Park
venues.tour_info: Tour admission $25. Historic baseball stadium.

venues.name: Boston Common
venues.tour_info: Free admission. America's oldest public park.

venues.name: Space Needle
venues.tour_info: Admission $35. Iconic observation tower with city views.

venues.name: Museum of Pop Culture (MoPOP)
venues.tour_info: Admission $30. Museum dedicated to contemporary popular culture.

venues.name: Chihuly Garden and Glass
venues.tour_info: Admission $32. Glass art museum and garden.

venues.name: Pike Place Market
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Historic public market with local vendors.

venues.name: Seattle Art Museum
venues.tour_info: Admission $20. Art museum with diverse collections.

venues.name: Vizcaya Museum and Gardens
venues.tour_info: Admission $22. Historic estate with Italian Renaissance gardens.

venues.name: Pérez Art Museum Miami (PAMM)
venues.tour_info: Admission $16. Modern and contemporary art museum.

venues.name: Frost Science Museum
venues.tour_info: Admission $30. Science museum with planetarium and aquarium.

venues.name: Wynwood Walls
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Outdoor museum of street art.

venues.name: South Beach
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Famous beach with Art Deco architecture.

venues.name: British Museum
venues.address: Great Russell St, London WC1B 3DG, UK
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Houses vast collection of world art and artifacts.

venues.name: National Gallery
venues.opening_hours: Mon-Thu, Sat-Sun: 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM; Fri: 10:00 AM - 9:00 PM
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Collection of Western European paintings.

venues.name: Tower of London
venues.tour_info: Admission £29. Historic castle and former royal palace.

venues.name: Tate Modern
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Modern and contemporary art museum.

venues.name: Westminster Abbey
venues.tour_info: Admission £27. Gothic church and UNESCO World Heritage Site.

venues.name: Tokyo National Museum
venues.address: 13-9 Ueno Park, Taito City, Tokyo 110-8712, Japan
venues.tour_info: Admission ¥1000. Japan's oldest national museum.

venues.name: Meiji Shrine
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Shinto shrine dedicated to Emperor Meiji.

venues.name: Senso-ji Temple
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Tokyo's oldest Buddhist temple.

venues.name: Tokyo Tower
venues.tour_info: Admission ¥1200. Communications tower with observation decks.

venues.name: Ginza District
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Upscale shopping area with art galleries.

venues.name: Sydney Opera House
venues.tour_info: Tour admission $43. Iconic performing arts center.

venues.name: Art Gallery of New South Wales
venues.address: Art Gallery Rd, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Leading art museum with diverse collections.

venues.name: Australian Museum
venues.tour_info: Admission $15. Natural history and anthropology museum.

venues.name: Sydney Harbour Bridge
venues.address: Sydney Harbour Bridge, Sydney NSW, Australia
venues.tour_info: Bridge climb $268. Steel arch bridge with climb experience.

venues.name: The Rocks
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Historic area with markets and galleries.

venues.name: Montreal Museum of Fine Arts
venues.address: 1380 Sherbrooke St W, Montreal, QC H3G 1J5, Canada
venues.tour_info: Admission $24. Canada's oldest art museum.

venues.name: McCord Museum
venues.address: 690 Sherbrooke St W, Montreal, QC H3A 1E9, Canada
venues.tour_info: Admission $20. Canadian history and culture museum.

venues.name: Notre-Dame Basilica
venues.address: 110 Notre-Dame St W, Montreal, QC H2Y 1T1, Canada
venues.tour_info: Admission $6. Gothic Revival cathedral.

venues.name: Old Montreal
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Historic district with cobblestone streets.

venues.name: Mount Royal Park
venues.address: 1260 Remembrance Rd, Montreal, QC H3H 1A2, Canada
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Large park with city views.

venues.name: Royal Ontario Museum
venues.address: 100 Queen's Park, Toronto, ON M5S 2C6, Canada
venues.tour_info: Admission $23. Natural history and world cultures museum.

venues.name: Art Gallery of Ontario
venues.address: 317 Dundas St W, Toronto, ON M5T 1G4, Canada
venues.tour_info: Admission $25. Art museum with Canadian and international collections.

venues.name: CN Tower
venues.address: 290 Bremner Blvd, Toronto, ON M5V 3L9, Canada
venues.tour_info: Admission $43. Iconic tower with observation decks.

venues.name: Casa Loma
venues.address: 1 Austin Terrace, Toronto, ON M5R 1X8, Canada
venues.tour_info: Admission $32. Gothic Revival castle.

venues.name: Distillery District
venues.address: 55 Mill St, Toronto, ON M5A 3C4, Canada
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Historic district with shops and galleries.

venues.name: Vancouver Art Gallery
venues.address: 750 Hornby St, Vancouver, BC V6Z 2H7, Canada
venues.tour_info: Admission $24. Contemporary art museum.

venues.name: Museum of Anthropology
venues.address: 6393 NW Marine Dr, Vancouver, BC V6T 1Z2, Canada
venues.tour_info: Admission $18. Anthropology museum with First Nations art.

venues.name: Capilano Suspension Bridge
venues.address: 3735 Capilano Rd, North Vancouver, BC V7R 4J1, Canada
venues.tour_info: Admission $54. Suspension bridge with treetop adventures.

venues.name: Stanley Park
venues.address: Stanley Park, Vancouver, BC V6G 1Z4, Canada
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Large urban park with seawall.

venues.name: Granville Island
venues.address: Granville Island, Vancouver, BC V6H 3S2, Canada
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Public market with local vendors.

venues.name: National Museum of Iran
venues.tour_info: Admission 500,000 IRR. Iran's largest museum of ancient artifacts.

venues.name: Golestan Palace
venues.tour_info: Admission 1,000,000 IRR. UNESCO World Heritage royal palace.

venues.name: Tehran Museum of Contemporary Art
venues.tour_info: Admission 300,000 IRR. Contemporary art museum.

venues.name: Azadi Tower
venues.tour_info: Admission 200,000 IRR. Iconic monument and symbol of Tehran.

venues.name: Grand Bazaar
venues.tour_info: Free admission. Historic covered market.

venues.name: Metropolitan Museum of Art
venues.tour_info: Suggested admission $25. One of the world's largest art museums.

venues.name: American Museum of Natural History
venues.address: Central Park West & 79th St, New York, NY 10024
venues.tour_info: Suggested admission $23. Features dinosaur fossils and planetarium.

venues.name: Metropolitan Museum of Art
venues.opening_hours: Sun-Thu: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM; Fri-Sat: 10:00 AM - 9:00 PM
venues.description: One of the world's largest art museums.
venues.tour_info: Pay-what-you-wish admission for New York residents.

venues.name: Museum of Modern Art (MoMA)
venues.description: Premier modern and contemporary art museum.
venues.tour_info: Home to Van Gogh's Starry Night and other masterpieces.

venues.name: American Museum of Natural History
venues.address: 200 Central Park W, New York, NY 10024
venues.description: World's largest natural history museum.
venues.tour_info: Pay-what-you-wish admission available.

venues.name: Statue of Liberty
venues.description: Iconic symbol of freedom and democracy.
venues.tour_info: Ferry access required. Crown access by reservation.

venues.name: Empire State Building
venues.description: Iconic Art Deco skyscraper.
venues.tour_info: Observation decks on 86th and 102nd floors.

venues.name: Central Park
venues.description: 843-acre urban park in Manhattan.
venues.tour_info: Features lakes, meadows, and cultural attractions.

venues.name: Times Square
venues.description: Famous commercial intersection and entertainment hub.
venues.tour_info: Known for its bright lights and Broadway theaters.

venues.name: Brooklyn Bridge
venues.description: Historic suspension bridge connecting Manhattan and Brooklyn.
venues.tour_info: Pedestrian walkway offers stunning city views.

venues.name: Louvre Museum
venues.tour_info: Admission €17. World's largest art museum, home to Mona Lisa.

venues.name: Musée d'Orsay
venues.address: 1 Rue de la Légion d'Honneur, 75007 Paris, France
venues.tour_info: Admission €16. French art from 19th and early 20th centuries.

venues.name: Musée du Louvre
venues.opening_hours: Mon, Thu, Sat-Sun: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM; Wed, Fri: 9:00 AM - 9:45 PM
venues.description: World's largest art museum and historic monument.
venues.tour_info: Home to the Mona Lisa and Venus de Milo.

venues.name: Musée d'Orsay
venues.address: 1 Rue de la Légion d'Honneur, 75007 Paris, France
venues.opening_hours: Tue-Sun: 9:30 AM - 6:00 PM; Thu: 9:30 AM - 9:45 PM
venues.description: Impressionist and post-impressionist art museum.
venues.tour_info: Housed in a former railway station.

venues.name: Eiffel Tower
venues.address: Champ de Mars, 5 Avenue Anatole France, 75007 Paris, France
venues.description: Iconic iron lattice tower and symbol of Paris.
venues.tour_info: Three levels accessible by stairs or elevator.

venues.name: Notre-Dame Cathedral
venues.address: 6 Parvis Notre-Dame - Pl. Jean-Paul II, 75004 Paris, France
venues.description: Medieval Catholic cathedral and architectural masterpiece.
venues.tour_info: Famous for its Gothic architecture and gargoyles.

venues.name: Arc de Triomphe
venues.address: Place Charles de Gaulle, 75008 Paris, France
venues.description: Monumental arch honoring those who fought for France.
venues.tour_info: Offers panoramic views from the top.

venues.name: Champs-Élysées
venues.description: Famous avenue known for luxury shopping and theaters.
venues.tour_info: Connects Place de la Concorde to Arc de Triomphe.

venues.name: Montmartre
venues.description: Historic hilltop district known for artists and Sacré-Cœur.
venues.tour_info: Famous for its bohemian atmosphere and street artists.

venues.name: Seine River
venues.description: Historic river flowing through the heart of Paris.
venues.tour_info: River cruises offer unique views of Paris landmarks.

venues.name: Smithsonian National Air and Space Museum
venues.description: Free admission. Features aviation and space exploration exhibits.
venues.tour_info: Home to the Wright Brothers' plane and Apollo 11 command module.

venues.name: Smithsonian National Museum of Natural History
venues.address: 10th St. & Constitution Ave. NW, Washington, DC 20560
venues.description: Free admission. World's largest natural history collection.
venues.tour_info: Features the Hope Diamond and dinosaur fossils.

venues.name: Smithsonian National Museum of American History
venues.description: Free admission. Preserves American heritage and culture.
venues.tour_info: Home to the Star-Spangled Banner and Dorothy's ruby slippers.

venues.name: Smithsonian National Museum of African American History and Culture
venues.description: Free admission. Celebrates African American history and culture.
venues.tour_info: Features artifacts from slavery to civil rights movement.

venues.name: Smithsonian National Museum of the American Indian
venues.address: 4th St. & Independence Ave. SW, Washington, DC 20560
venues.description: Free admission. Dedicated to Native American history and culture.
venues.tour_info: Features contemporary and traditional Native American art.

venues.name: Smithsonian Hirshhorn Museum and Sculpture Garden
venues.address: Independence Ave. SW & 7th St. SW, Washington, DC 20560
venues.description: Free admission. Modern and contemporary art museum.
venues.tour_info: Features outdoor sculpture garden and rotating exhibitions.

venues.name: Smithsonian Freer Gallery of Art
venues.description: Free admission. Asian art and American art collections.
venues.tour_info: Features Whistler's Peacock Room and Asian ceramics.

venues.name: Smithsonian Arthur M. Sackler Gallery
venues.description: Free admission. Asian art museum.
venues.tour_info: Connected to Freer Gallery, features ancient and modern Asian art.

venues.name: National Gallery of Art
venues.opening_hours: Mon-Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM; Sun: 11:00 AM - 6:00 PM
venues.description: Free admission. Houses European and American art collections.
venues.tour_info: Features works by Leonardo da Vinci, Van Gogh, and Monet.

venues.name: United States Holocaust Memorial Museum
venues.address: 100 Raoul Wallenberg Pl SW, Washington, DC 20024
venues.description: Free admission. Memorial and educational institution.
venues.tour_info: Commemorates the Holocaust and educates about genocide prevention.

venues.name: International Spy Museum
venues.description: Interactive museum about espionage history.
venues.tour_info: Features spy artifacts and interactive exhibits.

venues.name: Newseum
venues.description: Museum dedicated to news and journalism.
venues.tour_info: Features Pulitzer Prize photographs and news history.

venues.name: Lincoln Memorial
venues.address: 2 Lincoln Memorial Cir NW, Washington, DC 20037
venues.description: Memorial honoring Abraham Lincoln.
venues.tour_info: Features the famous seated Lincoln statue and Gettysburg Address.

venues.name: Washington Monument
venues.description: Iconic obelisk honoring George Washington.
venues.tour_info: Tallest stone structure in the world at 555 feet.

venues.name: Jefferson Memorial
venues.address: 701 E Basin Dr SW, Washington, DC 20242
venues.description: Memorial honoring Thomas Jefferson.
venues.tour_info: Features quotes from the Declaration of Independence.

venues.name: Vietnam Veterans Memorial
venues.address: 5 Henry Bacon Dr NW, Washington, DC 20007
venues.description: Memorial honoring Vietnam War veterans.
venues.tour_info: Features the Wall with names of fallen soldiers.

venues.name: Korean War Veterans Memorial
venues.description: Memorial honoring Korean War veterans.
venues.tour_info: Features 19 stainless steel statues representing soldiers.

venues.name: World War II Memorial
venues.description: Memorial honoring World War II veterans.
venues.tour_info: Features 56 pillars representing US states and territories.

venues.name: Martin Luther King Jr. Memorial
venues.description: Memorial honoring Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.
venues.tour_info: Features the Stone of Hope with King's likeness.

venues.name: Franklin Delano Roosevelt Memorial
venues.address: 1850 West Basin Dr SW, Washington, DC 20024
venues.description: Memorial honoring President Franklin D. Roosevelt.
venues.tour_info: Features four outdoor rooms representing his four terms.

venues.name: Capitol Building
venues.description: Home of the U.S. Congress.
venues.tour_info: Free guided tours available by reservation.

venues.name: White House
venues.description: Official residence of the U.S. President.
venues.tour_info: Public tours available through congressional offices.

venues.name: Supreme Court
venues.description: Highest court in the United States.
venues.tour_info: Free guided tours and courtroom lectures available.

venues.name: Library of Congress
venues.description: Largest library in the world.
venues.tour_info: Free guided tours of the Jefferson Building available.

venues.name: Georgetown
venues.description: Historic waterfront neighborhood.
venues.tour_info: Features historic architecture, shopping, and dining.

venues.name: Capitol Hill
venues.description: Historic neighborhood home to Congress.
venues.tour_info: Features historic rowhouses and Eastern Market.

venues.name: Dupont Circle
venues.description: Historic neighborhood and traffic circle.
venues.tour_info: Features embassies, galleries, and restaurants.

venues.name: National Mall
venues.description: Historic park connecting monuments and museums.
venues.tour_info: Two-mile stretch from Capitol to Lincoln Memorial.

venues.name: Tidal Basin
venues.description: Man-made reservoir surrounded by cherry trees.
venues.tour_info: Famous for cherry blossom season in spring.

venues.name: Rock Creek Park
venues.description: Large urban park with hiking trails and nature center.
venues.tour_info: Features the National Zoo and planetarium.

venues.name: National Zoo
venues.description: Free admission. Smithsonian's National Zoo.
venues.tour_info: Home to giant pandas and over 2,700 animals.

venues.name: Kennedy Center
venues.description: Premier performing arts center.
venues.tour_info: Home to the National Symphony Orchestra and Washington National Opera.

venues.name: Ford's Theatre
venues.description: Historic theater where Lincoln was assassinated.
venues.tour_info: Features museum, theater performances, and Petersen House.

venues.name: Arena Stage
venues.description: Regional theater company.
venues.tour_info: Produces contemporary and classic American plays.

venues.name: Baltimore Museum of Art
venues.description: Free admission. Features contemporary and modern art collections.
venues.tour_info: Home to the Cone Collection of Matisse and Picasso works.

venues.name: Walters Art Museum
venues.description: Free admission. Comprehensive art collection spanning 55 centuries.
venues.tour_info: Features ancient Egyptian, Greek, and Roman art.

venues.name: Fort McHenry National Monument
venues.description: Birthplace of the Star-Spangled Banner.
venues.tour_info: Historic fort that defended Baltimore during the War of 1812.

venues.name: Inner Harbor
venues.description: Historic waterfront district with shops, restaurants, and attractions.
venues.tour_info: Home to the National Aquarium and historic ships.

venues.name: National Aquarium
venues.description: One of the nation's premier aquariums.
venues.tour_info: Features over 20,000 animals in award-winning exhibits.

venues.name: Philadelphia Museum of Art
venues.description: One of the largest art museums in the United States.
venues.tour_info: Famous for the Rocky Steps and extensive art collections.

venues.name: Independence Hall
venues.description: Birthplace of American independence.
venues.tour_info: Where the Declaration of Independence and Constitution were signed.

venues.name: Liberty Bell Center
venues.description: Home of the iconic Liberty Bell.
venues.tour_info: Symbol of American freedom and independence.

venues.name: Franklin Institute
venues.description: Premier science museum and educational center.
venues.tour_info: Features interactive exhibits and the famous Giant Heart.

venues.name: Reading Terminal Market
venues.description: Historic public market with diverse food vendors.
venues.tour_info: One of America's oldest and largest public markets.
